entities.name: bathroom
entities.description: The bathroom is mentioned as the place where the protagonist left from. ("Bathroom," he muttered, and he left the room as fast as he could without running.)

entities.name: room
entities.description: The room is mentioned as the place where the protagonist was in before leaving. (He barely made it: Bolting the door behind him with trembling hands, he grasped his pounding head and fell to the floor)

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The giant blond Death Eater is mentioned as a person who is being tortured. (and the giant blond Death Eater on the floor, screaming and writhing)

entities.name: rowle
entities.description: Rowle is mentioned as a person who is being threatened by Lord Voldemort. (You called me back for this, to tell me that Harry Potter has escaped again? A Place to Hide Draco, give Rowle another taste of our displeasure)

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as a person who is being ordered by Lord Voldemort. (A Place to Hide Draco, give Rowle another taste of our displeasure)

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is mentioned as an animal that is being threatened by Lord Voldemort. (More, Rowle, or shall we end it and feed you to Nagini?)

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a person who has escaped again. (You called me back for this, to tell me that Harry Potter has escaped again?)

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the one who is threatening Rowle and Nagini. (More, Rowle, or shall we end it and feed you to Nagini? Lord Voldemort is not sure that he will forgive this time)

relationships.description: Lord Voldemort threatens Rowle. (More, Rowle, or shall we end it and feed you to Nagini? Lord Voldemort is not sure that he will forgive this time)
Lord Voldemort threatens Nagini. (More, Rowle, or shall we end it and feed you to Nagini?)
Draco orders Rowle to give him another taste of their displeasure. (A Place to Hide Draco, give Rowle another taste of our displeasure)
Harry Potter has escaped from Lord Voldemort. (You called me back for this, to tell me that Harry Potter has escaped again?)
